To provide an unbiased starting point that enables more efficient discussions between validators and developers, you assess compliance with guidelines based on analyzing evidence and findings.

## Prerequisites

- {{< var link.login >}}

- The model you are documenting is registered in the model inventory.[^1]

- A model developer has marked their model documentation as **Ready for Validation**.[^2]

<!-- NTS NOT DONE YET  -->

- To assess compliance, you must have the following permissions:[^3]

    - **Documentation** — Permission to read and add comments to model documentation.
    - **Findings** — Permission to read, add, update, and delete findings, as well as add finding comments.
    - **Validation Reports** — Permission to:
      - Read and update validation reports
      - Add and remove blocks on validation reports
      - Add comments to validation reports
      - Swap report templates
      - Acesss assessment guidelines
    
    By default, the `Validator` role has all these permissions.

## Link evidence to reports

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.
